title: 4 BED 2 BATH GEM IN THE HEART OF WEST TOWN, MUST SEE!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   PROPERTY INFO ID: 299619011Rent: $3,300 / MonthBeds: 4Bath: 2Available Date: 08/01/2022Pet: Pet FriendlyRent Includes:: WaterParking:: off-street parking Gorgeous four bedroom, two bathroom gut rehab featuring:  * Hardwood floors  * Central heat and air * Fully equipped and updated island kitchen * Granite countertops * Stainless steel appliances * Oversized fridge with ice/water dispenser * Gas oven/range * Built-in microwave * Dishwasher * Separate living and dining room with gas fireplace * Spacious bedrooms * Great closet/storage space * Upgraded bathrooms * Jacuzzi * In-unit laundry * Spacious deck * Great West Town location near shopping, nightlife, transportation, and more!
